verses.name: Luke 22:37
verses.text: For I say unto you, that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me, And he was reckoned among the transgressors: for the things concerning me have an end.

verses.name: Luke 22:38
verses.text: And they said, Lord, behold, here are two swords. And he said unto them, It is enough.

verses.name: Luke 22:39
verses.text: And he came out, and went, as he was wont, to the mount of Olives; and his disciples also followed him.

verses.name: Luke 22:40
verses.text: And when he was at the place, he said unto them, Pray that ye enter not into temptation.
